summary.Title: Softwareingeniør (Software Engineer)

JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Om os:
Vi er en startup, der kombinerer sundhed og teknologi for at skabe smartere løsninger til patienter og deres omsorgspersoner. Vi søger en softwareingeniør, der brænder for at udvikle avanceret software til sundhedssektoren.

Ansvarsområder:

  • Udvikle backend-systemer til at understøtte robotens funktionalitet.

  • Implementere og vedligeholde brugerflader til caregivers.

  • Sikre skalerbarhed og pålidelighed i softwarearkitekturen.

  • Integrere software med sensorer og AI-komponenter.

Kvalifikationer:

  • Bachelor eller kandidatgrad i softwareudvikling, datalogi eller lignende.

  • Erfaring med programmeringssprog som Python, C++, eller JavaScript.

  • Erfaring med API-integrationer og cloud-løsninger.

  • God forståelse for UX/UI-design.

Vi tilbyder:

  • Mulighed for at arbejde med cutting-edge teknologi.

  • En rolle, hvor din indsats direkte bidrager til bedre patientpleje.

  • Mulighed for vækst i en startup med stort potentiale.

About Us:
We are a startup combining healthcare and technology to create smarter solutions for patients and their caregivers. We are looking for a software engineer who is passionate about developing advanced software for the healthcare sector.

Responsibilities:

  • Develop backend systems to support the bed’s functionality.

  • Implement and maintain user interfaces for caregivers.

  • Ensure scalability and reliability in software architecture.

  • Integrate software with sensors and AI components.

Qualifications:

  • Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Software Development, Computer Science, or a related field.

  • Experience with programming languages such as Python, C++, or JavaScript.

  • Familiarity with API integrations and cloud solutions.

  • Good understanding of UX/UI design.

What We Offer:

  • The opportunity to work with cutting-edge technology.

  • A role where your efforts directly improve patient care.

  • Growth opportunities in a high-potential startup.
